short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tailor your resume to stand out for every job application, all from within your web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Land Your Next Job with Confidence!

Jobbo helps you tailor your resume to stand out for every job you apply to. Upload your resume, compare it to job descriptions directly in the browser, and get actionable insights to improve your chances - all in seconds.

✔ Save time and focus on what matters
✔ Match your resume to job requirements
✔ Easy to use and free to get started

Don’t let your dream job slip away. Add Jobbo to Chrome today and start optimizing your applications!
